1.text: Grease a microwave-safe dish or mug.

2.text: Crack 2 eggs into the dish or mug and add 1 tablespoon (15 ml) of milk.
2.vid: /9/98/Make Scrambled Eggs in a Microwave Step 2 Version 3.360p.mp4

3.text: Beat the eggs with salt and pepper until they're combined.
3.vid: /6/63/Make Scrambled Eggs in a Microwave Step 3 Version 3.360p.mp4

4.text: Microwave the eggs for 1 1/2 to 2 minutes and stir them frequently.
4.vid: /9/9d/Make Scrambled Eggs in a Microwave Step 4 Version 3.360p.mp4

5.text: Remove the dish from the microwave and eat the hot scrambled eggs.

6.text: Stir cheese into the eggs for a creamy texture.
6.vid: /7/79/Make Scrambled Eggs in a Microwave Step 6 Version 3.360p.mp4

7.text: Add cooked meat if you'd like an extra savory flavor.

8.text: Create a quick egg sandwich to make a complete meal.

9.text: Make a quick breakfast hash in the microwave.

10.text: Top the eggs with fresh herbs to brighten their flavor.
10.vid: /c/cb/Make Scrambled Eggs in a Microwave Step 10 Version 3.360p.mp4

11.text: Serve the scrambled eggs with salsa or your favorite sauce.
11.vid: /0/04/Make Scrambled Eggs in a Microwave Step 11 Version 3.360p.mp4
